title: Adele Confirms She's Married Her Longtime Partner Simon Konecki
text:
After years of speculation, it looks like Adele has pretty much confirmed her marriage to partner Simon Konecki. During her Album of the Year acceptance speech at Sunday's Grammys , the singer referred to her long-time beau as her "husband" while saying her thanks.
"To the Grammys, I appreciate it â€” the Academy, I love you. My manager, my husband and my son, you're the only reason I do it," she said as Simon looked on.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Speculation over the status of the pair has been rife ever since they first got together in 2011, and last year, she quipped that they "might as well be married."
"I would tell you if I did," she said at a show in Minnesota in July 2016. "I wouldn't be able to contain myself. He simply hasn't proposed yet, so let's move on from that."
The pair have a 4-year-old son, Angelo, together.
